item.title: 0735 | Publish Hugo Website on Github
item.description: GeekLaunch has a Youtube Hugo playlist (7 videos) Youtube | GeekLaunch | How to make a website and put it online 2017 Tutorial (Hugo, Linux) Github youtube shortcode Web: Sign into github account Web: Create new repository and copy the address for the git remote add origin Terminal: navigate to green websites/hugo-harrycresswell This is where some Hugo testing is in progress. Terminal: git commands git init git remote add origin https://github.
